content: originally designed for our mkal this pattern has been so popular that it will remain in the same format with four clues to follow for any groups or individual knitters who may still enjoy the element of surprise **click on each clue below and follow link to pattern section ** if you were to receive a postcard from ***s-u-m-m-e-r*** on a blustery winter day what would it say take part in our **mystery** **knit a long** and create lasting memories in a beautiful knitted shawl to keep you warm throughout the chilly days to come choose 1 skein each in three colorways of peppino from *the yarns of rhichard* *devrieze* handpainted fingering weight merino that you feel drawn to and remind you of summer follow along as we release a series of four clues- clue 1 1 clue 2 2 clue 3 3 clue 4 4 note please be sure your gauge is accurate as this project follows a set number of row for each colourway a looser gauge will greatly affect how far your yarn will go note if you enjoyed this mkal please watch for our new summer road trip 2017 mkal 5 details posted in june brought to you by the yarns of rhichard devrieze and muskoka yarn connection ***yours truly *summer* 1 http //afreshyarn blogspot ca/2015/07/clue-one html 2 http //afreshyarn blogspot ca/2015/08/clue-two html 3 http //afreshyarn blogspot ca/2015/08/clue-three html 4 http //afreshyarn blogspot ca/2015/09/clue-four html 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/summer-road-trip-mkal please enjoy this free knitting pattern and if you would like future notice of more free patterns follow me at @muskokayarn on instagram and @muskokayarnconnection on facebook
